channel.title: Azure SQL Database on BartekR
channel.description: Recent content in Azure SQL Database on BartekR

item.title: Read Data From Azure Blob Storage to Azure SQL Database
item.description: In one of the projects, we store source files as JSON data on Azure Blob Storage. These files must be loaded into Azure SQL Database. We use a .NET code to perform this, but how could I load the files directly into Azure SQL Database? The environment Nothing extraordinary: a default storage account bartekr01stacc configured with local redundancy (LRS) + SQL Database VariousExamples located within bartekr01 Azure SQL Server. The storage account has json-data-container container (set as private) and json-data-share file share.
